page.title: 16Housing In Harley
page.content: {Harley}is split into{three}sections of{housing.}First there are the{old {stone cottages,}then there are the {council houses}and last there are the {new private houses.}The{old stone {cottages}look very pretty and most of them have been{modernised}now to make them comfortable inside. Most of the people who live in them have lived in {Harley}for a long time. The{council {houses}are all built along one road and some of them are{old peoples {bungalows.}The{modern private houses are all at one end of the village and they are a mixture of{houses}and {bungalows.}The shops, pub and church are all in the{old}part of the village. The people we spoke to all liked living in{Harley}and didn't want it to change. I think{Harley}is a nice quiet village but I would{not}like to live there my self.
